full_summary:
## Request for Proposal: Spares for Doors and Hatches
### Solicitation Number: W8482-230828/A

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the procurement of spares for doors and hatches.

### Notice Date: October 4, 2022

The closing date for proposals is November 10, 2022, at 2 p.m. Eastern Time.

### Procurement Details
The proposed contract is for the delivery of commercial hardware and keys/blanks to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

The proposed contract includes the following requirements:

* 12,300 units of hardware to be delivered to CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt
* The proposal must include a detailed breakdown of the quantities required for each item, as specified in the solicitation document

### Contract Requirements
* The contractor must provide proof of certification for the quality and durability of the goods and materials offered
* The contractor must provide a warranty for the goods and materials offered, as per the terms and conditions outlined in the solicitation document
* The contractor must ensure compliance with all applicable laws and regulations

### Bidder Instructions
* Proposals must be submitted in Canadian dollars
* Prices must be in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Bidders must submit their proposals electronically, in accordance with the requirements specified in the solicitation document

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
* Katerina Drescher, Contracting Officer
* Department of National Defence
* 101 Colonel By Dr
* Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2
* Email: [katerina.drescher@forces.gc.ca](mailto:katerina.drescher@forces.gc.ca)

### Attachments

Link to the Request for Proposal (RFP) document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/04/f0e0dc0fb5fe8cae5463a393513035aa/rfp_w8482-230828_en.pdf
